column1: Kata Robata////It has been a while now since I've been as impressed as I was with my meal at Kata Robata. Not that I was very skeptical
column2: but there are enough Robata places in town (and good ones at that) that I wasn't expecting anything groundbreaking. Yet
column3: after having the grilled Yellow Tail Collar and the Miso Crusted Bone Marrow with red pickled onions and mustard seeds
column4: I can say without a doubt that Kata Robata has a new loyal fan...
